item.description:
Relieve Stress The Safe and Healthy Way and Meet Other Smart and Healthy Singles

Join SinglesCT.com for a specially designed Yoga for Stress Release class – that is designed for anyone who wants to lean the natural and healthy way to reduce stress – and meet some great people before and after the event.

We will meet at 7 pm class for about an hour of specially designed class that focuses on Stress Relief. After the class, we will go across the street to Tango for a drink or a bite to eat.

Tango will extend the Happy Hour prices for our group, and a Tapas menu is available for light dining.

This is a great class for both beginners and the more experienced, and you will leave this class feeling calm, stress-free, relaxed and enjoying the natural high that comes with Yoga and deep breathing.

WHAT TO BRING: Wear loose comfortable clothing and bring water. You can bring your own Yoga mat ($5 at Ocean State) or one will be provided for you at the studio.

WHAT TO EXPECT: You can expect to meet many quality, healthy local Singles, and feel refreshed and stress-free with this centuries old tested method for stress-relief that focuses on the healthy Holistic approach to total body health – and managing your stress without the use of chemicals is a very important part of total body health.

* This class is only $10 ADV TIX online, or $15 at the event *

SPACE IS LIMITED TO 20 PEOPLE AND WILL FILL UP QUICKLY

NOTE: - To reserve your spot, you NEED to purchase your ticket


Sacred Rivers Yoga
2934 Main Street
Glastonbury, CT 06033
860.657.9545
http://www.sacredrive...

You can get your ticket here, or at http://www.SinglesCT....
or call (860) 236-3343

SEE YOU AT THE STUDIO
item.how_to_find_us: We will by the front desk, look for the SInglesCT.com Party Tonight signs
